channel.title: [PI] Help please, Cant attack
channel.description:
Uhm , I am trying to add an Npc called "Stranger" And the NPC id is 1919 although when i added it i am not able to attack it i re-logged and everything and i cant attack it , when i tried to use magic on it it said i wasnt aloud to attack this NPC
Can someone help me make this NPC attackable?

item.title: [PI] Help please, Cant attack
item.dc:creator: @hawkgames hawkgames
item.description:
@hawkgames wrote:

If you haven’t added the npc to npc.cfg with health points, you won’t be able to attack the non-playable player.

npc = {NPC ID} {NPC NAME} {COMBAT} {HP}
npc = 3340 Giant_Mole 230 200

Read full topic
